Technique: ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED
Name: Vase
Description: Spherical vase with wide mouth, pointed rim, curved walls and stable base with flat bottom. Orangey-coloured paste and interior and exterior surface with reddish coating. The exterior presents a painted decoration consisting of three vertical white bands, running from the rim to the base, with two or three vertical lines in black.
